vars.memberList: []Address // all the recipients of this dividend
vars.members: []Int64 // all the recipient factors of this dividend
vars.owner: AgentId // owner, only one who can call 'member' func
vars.totalFactor: Int64 // sum of all recipient factors

init.owner: ?AgentId // optional owner, defaults to contract creator

member.#grant: owner // only defined owner can add members

setOwner.#grant: owner // only defined owner can change owner
setOwner.owner: AgentId // new owner of smart contract
